text: Hooaga dono daiaa, gei di hagataalunga huaidu mai baahi o God ga ulu gi lodo o Saul, gei Saul ga leelee laba hua i lodo dono hale, i dono hagawelewele gadoo be tangada gu dadaulia. David e dadaahili i dana ‘harp’ be dana hai dela e hai i nia laangi huogodoo, gei Saul e dadaahi dana daalo i dono lima,
